title: Find short-run supply curve on cost curve graph

content.description: The graph above shows the cost curves for May’s Fruit Farm, where <math alttext="M C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>MC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is marginal cost, <math alttext="A T C" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mtext>ATC</mtext> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> is average total cost, and <math alttext="A V C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>AVC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is average variable cost.
content.question: May’s short-run supply curve includes which of the following points?

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

topic.text: 3.6: Firms' Short-Run Decisions to Produce and Long-Run Decisions to Enter or Exit a Market

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
